thread.title: Two Baltimore Detectives Convicted of Racketeering, Robbery

author: wsjcom
title: Two Baltimore Detectives Convicted of Racketeering, Robbery
text:
BALTIMORE—Two Baltimore police detectives were convicted of racketeering and robbery Monday in a trial that is part of a continuing federal investigation into corruption among rogue members of the city’s beleaguered police force.
Detectives Daniel Hersl and Marcus Taylor were shackled and led out of the courtroom after the verdict was read.
